block.p: Susan Marie Hernan, a daughter of Susan and Edward Hernan of Hilton Head Island, S.C., was married there yesterday afternoon to Mason Comins Sleeper, a son of Jeanne Sleeper and Dr. Herbert Sleeper of Naples, Fla. The Rev. Francis Stroud performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Francis.

Mrs. Sleeper, 28, teaches kindergarten at St. David's School in New York. She graduated and received a master's degree in education from Boston College. Her father retired as a director of the sales and marketing division of Nynex in New York.

Susan Marie Hernan, a daughter of Susan and Edward Hernan of Hilton Head Island, S.C., was married there yesterday afternoon to Mason Comins Sleeper, a son of Jeanne Sleeper and Dr. Herbert Sleeper of Naples, Fla. The Rev. Francis Stroud performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Francis.

Mrs. Sleeper, 28, teaches kindergarten at St. David's School in New York. She graduated and received a master's degree in education from Boston College. Her father retired as a director of the sales and marketing division of Nynex in New York.

Mr. Sleeper, 39, was until March a partner in Shearman & Sterling, the New York law firm. He is now a managing director of the real estate investment group of Credit Suisse First Boston, the New York investment bank. The bridegroom graduated magna cum laude from Tufts University and received law and M.B.A. degrees from Cornell University. His father, a retired oral surgeon, practiced in New Haven and was also the chairman of oral surgery at Yale-New Haven Hospital and an associate professor at Yale Medical School.
